snippet: “Tent City U.S.A.,” a documentary being shown Thursday night on the Oprah Winfrey Network, follows a group of homeless people through a flood and more.
abstract: Mike Hale reviews the Oprah Winfrey Network original documentary Tent City U.S.A., directed by Steven Cantor.
lead_paragraph: “Tent City U.S.A.,” a documentary being shown Thursday night on the Oprah Winfrey Network, follows a group of homeless people through a flood and more.

headline.seo: ‘Tent City U.S.A.,’ Nashville Documentary on OWN
